TopicTitle: Unable to save games while using KIS/KAS

Articles.Content:
I've run into a curious problem and am hoping others have either seen it as well, can reproduce it, and/or have a solution - KSP 1.11, btw. 

I've got Bill floating around with an SC-62 container on his back. I was able to do some construction (pulled parts out and mounted them w/ construction mode) w/o any problems, and was able to save games (Alt+F5) as normal. I got another part from a storage unit on another ship, put it in the container, and all seemed well until I tried to save the game (Alt+F5). Although I was able to input the save name, it wouldn't actually save the game;  just no response from the menu. ESC closed the menu, but left the game paused; I had to tap ESC again to get it running. I tapped ESC again to bring up the 'Resume/Load/Save/Quit' menu and while I could Resume, Load, or go to Settings, the other menu buttons wouldn't work (Save, Quit, Space Center,  Tracking Center). 

Any suggestions?
Maybe related?

40 minutes ago, VoidSquid said:

Maybe related?

 

Yep, definitely ... I've seen the same RCS issue as well in a different game. Good to know it's not a personal problem.

I upvoted the bug report. Thanks for linking me to that thread!

Edited January 8, 2021 by maddog59
